A Career in Risk Management at Lexipol

Lexipol is America’s leading provider of risk management policies and resources for public safety organizations. Our current services include the production of content-rich, web-based policy manuals, training materials and custom publications. Lexipol is an established, rapidly growing company headquartered in Aliso Viejo, California.

Lexipol delivers our services through a unique, web-based development system with an integrated training component. The Lexipol system helps public safety agencies reduce risk and stay ahead of litigation trends, while communicating clear and concise policy guidance to their employees.

California’s Orange County Business Journal has recognized Lexipol as one of the 100 Fastest Growing Private Companies in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014. Lexipol is also proud to be selected as a Deloitte Technology Fast 500™ award winner for 2012 and 2013.

One of Orange County’s Best Places to Work

Lexipol has a dynamic corporate culture that emphasizes work/life balance, attracts highly skilled and motivated professionals, and results in a high level of job satisfaction. Lexipol employees are innovative, passionate and intelligent individuals who are proud to be members of an exceptional team.

Named as one of Orange County’s Best Places to Work in 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013, Lexipol offers a casual work atmosphere, comfortable office surroundings, current technology and equipment, a supportive team environment and business casual attire.

Lexipol is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE). Applicants are considered for employment without regard to age, race, color, creed, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, disability, genetic information, or military and veteran status.

Lexipol’s comprehensive benefit plan includes:

  • Vacation and sick leave
  • Paid holidays
  • Medical, dental and vision plans
  • Group life insurance
  • Accidental death and dismemberment insurance
  • Short term disability insurance
  • Flexible spending accounts for medical and dependent care
  • 401(k) plan
  • Education assistance program

Partner Testimonial

"Lexipol is, indeed, ahead of the curve with their unique risk management solutions in law enforcement. The Minnesota Sheriffs' Association has been eagerly anticipating the release of the Lexipol Custody Manual. Lexipol meets the needs of law enforcement and custodial agencies by recognizing the emerging challenges facing our agencies, and providing comprehensive tools and resources to reduce liability and risk in a professional and highly efficient manner. The Minnesota Sheriffs' Association is proud of its continued partnership with Lexipol."

Jim Franklin, Executive Director
Minnesota Sheriffs' Association, MN
